faqs.question: How long does fence installation typically take?
faqs.answer: Installation time varies by project size and type. Most residential wood or vinyl fences take 2-5 days. Chain link can be completed in 1-2 days. Complex ornamental iron projects may take up to a week. Weather conditions can affect timeline.

faqs.question: Do I need a permit for fence installation?
faqs.answer: Permit requirements vary by city and county. We handle all permit applications for our customers. Most residential fences under 6 feet don't require permits, but HOA approval may be needed. Commercial projects typically require permits.

faqs.question: What's the difference between wood and vinyl fencing?
faqs.answer: Wood fencing offers natural beauty and is initially less expensive but requires regular maintenance (staining/sealing every 2-3 years). Vinyl fencing costs more upfront but is virtually maintenance-free and comes with a 25-year warranty.

faqs.question: How do you determine property lines?
faqs.answer: We recommend having a property survey done before installation. We can work with your surveyor or recommend trusted local surveyors. Installing on property lines requires neighbor agreement. We can install fences 1-2 feet inside your property line to avoid disputes.

faqs.question: What maintenance does my fence need?
faqs.answer: Wood fences need staining or sealing every 2-3 years. Vinyl and aluminum need only occasional washing. Chain link may need rust touch-ups. All fences benefit from annual inspections to check for loose hardware or damage.

faqs.question: Can you match an existing fence style?
faqs.answer: Yes, we can match most existing fence styles and colors. We keep samples of common materials and can custom-order specific matches. Bring photos or samples for the most accurate matching.

faqs.question: What happens if my fence gets damaged in a storm?
faqs.answer: We offer 24/7 emergency repair services for security issues. Most homeowner's insurance covers storm damage to fences. We can work directly with your insurance company and provide detailed estimates for claims.

faqs.question: Do you offer financing options?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer financing through approved credit. Options include 0% interest for 12 months or longer-term financing with competitive rates. We also accept all major credit cards and can set up payment plans for larger projects.
